name: White Carve
description:
You are about to create a minimalistic modern masterpiece. 

Take a deep breath...relax. 

Go full screen. 

MMmmm. Much better.

Click on the canvas. Wait...observe.

Choose a brush in the top right corner (or hit B)

 Click more. 

Nice.

I think it turned out fine. Maybe right click and save? 

Undo? No. There are no mistakes. Only happy accidents. (Or refresh the page duh.)
